problem_text_cn: 如图,在直径为82cm的圆柱形油槽内装有一些油以后,油面宽AB=80cm,则油的最大深度为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, after some oil is filled in a cylindrical oil groove with a diameter of N_0, the oil surface width AB = N_1, then the maximum depth of the oil is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,过O作OC⊥AB于点C,并延长交⊙O于点D,连结OA,依题意得CD就是油的最大深度,根据垂径定理得:AC=\frac{1}{2}AB=40cm,OA=41cm,在Rt△OAC中,根据勾股定理得:OC=√{0A^{2}-AC^{2}}=√{41^{2}-40^{2}}=9(cm),∴CD=OD-OC=41-9=32(cm),故选:A．
